error.already_configured: This account name has already been used. Use re-configure.
error.error_authenticating: Error authenticating, JSONDecodeError, check log for errors
error.invalid_url: Error, the originating url does not seem to be a valid microsoft redirect
error.permissions: Minimum permissions not granted for account: {entity_name}
error.corrupted: Token file is corrupted after successful authentication, check log for file system errors
error.missing: Token file is missing after successful authentication, check log for file system errors
error.token_file_error: Token file retrieval error, check log for errors from O365

data.entity_name: Uniquely identifying name for the entities
data.shared_mailbox: Email address or ID of shared mailbox

user.description: Enter previously created Entra ID App Registration credentials

request_default.title: Authorization Required - {entity_name}
request_default.description:
Complete the configuration by clicking on the link and copying the returned url into this field afterwards and submit

[Link MS365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}

request_alt.title: Authorization Required - {entity_name}
request_alt.description:
To link your MS365 account, click the link, login, and authorize:

[Link MS365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}

data.from_address: Only retrieve emails from this email address

corrupted.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
corrupted.description: The token file is corrupted. Please Reconfigure the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

missing.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
missing.description: The token file is missing. Please Reconfigure the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

external_reply.description: The message to be send to external emails (or to all emails, if you don't have an organisation email)
external_reply.name: External reply

internal_reply.description: The message to be send to internal emails
internal_reply.name: Internal Reply

start.description: The start time of the schedule
start.name: Start date & time

end.description: The end time of the schedule
end.name: End date & time

external_audience.description: The set of audience external to the signed-in user's organization who will receive the ExternalReplyMessage. The possible values are: none, contactsOnly, all.
external_audience.name: External Audience
